# Import and Require Tree

> Generate an import/require tree.

<!-- Section to include introductory text. Make sure to keep an empty line after the intro `section` element and another before the `/section` close. -->

<section class="intro">

</section>

<!-- /.intro -->

<!-- Package usage documentation. -->

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var walk = require( '@stdlib/_tools/modules/import-require-tree' );
```

#### walk( file, clbk )

Starting from a `file` entry point, walks the `import`/`require` dependency graph and returns a dependency tree.

```javascript
walk( 'beep', clbk );

function clbk( error, tree ) {
    if ( error ) {
        throw error;
    }
}
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

<!-- Package usage notes. Make sure to keep an empty line after the `section` element and another before the `/section` close. -->

</section>

<section class="examples">

## Examples

<!-- eslint no-undef: "error" -->

```javascript
var walk = require( '@stdlib/_tools/modules/import-require-tree' );

walk();
```

</section>

<!-- /.examples -->

### Usage

```text
Usage: import-require-tree [options] <file>

Options:

  -h,    --help                Print this message.
  -V,    --version             Print the package version.
```
